metrics.name: Maverick Buying - Prices Changes after Goods Receipt
metrics.description: Total number of cases with price changes that happened after the Goods Receipt had already been registered
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${ptp_maverick_buying_condition})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Perfect order fulfillment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases that went through without any reversal of Goods Receipts
metrics.signalFragment:
(COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES(${goods_receipt_events}))
	)
	-
	COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES(${goods_receipt_reversal_events}))
	))
	/
	COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES(${goods_receipt_events}))
	)
	* 100

metrics.name: Two-way match rate
metrics.description: Percentage of purchase orders with a two-way match

metrics.name: Average invoice payment time
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${invoice_clearing_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${invoice_receipt_events}))
   )

metricsVariables.name: goods_receipt_reversal_events
metricsVariables.description: Events identifying the reversal of a Goods Receipt, for example 'Reverse Goods Receipt'

metricsVariables.name: invoice_clearing_events
metricsVariables.description: Events indicating the clearing of an invoice, for example 'Clear Invoice'

metricsVariables.name: two_way_match_condition
metricsVariables.description: Condition identifying cases with a two-way attribute match, for example "PO Item Net Order Value" = "PO Item Total Invoiced Net Amount Document Curr."
metricsVariables.value: "PO Item Net Order Value" = "PO Item Total Invoiced Net Amount Document Curr."

metricsVariables.name: goods_receipt_events
metricsVariables.description: Events identifying the receipt of goods, for example 'Create Goods Receipt'

metricsVariables.name: ptp_maverick_buying_condition
metricsVariables.description: Event flow indicating that the purchase order was created after the receival of the invoice, for example 'Create FI Invoice' ~> 'Create PO Item'

metricsVariables.name: invoice_receipt_events
metricsVariables.description: Events indicating the receipt of an invoice, for example 'Record Invoice Receipt', 'Create FI Invoice'

children.name: Maverick Buying - Prices Changes after Goods Receipt
what's my perfect order fulfil rate
